metadata.title: CVE-2019-16787 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-19905.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2019-19905. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2019-19905 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
